automation_yaml:
id: 'living_room_lights_office_wled_pulse'
alias: Living Room Lights - Pulse Office WLED 20 Percent
description: "When any living room light turns on between 21:00 and 23:00, briefly turn Office WLED on at 20% brightness for 10 seconds, then turn it off."
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: state
    entity_id:
      # NOTE: Add your actual living room light entity_ids here
      # Example:
      # - light.living_room_main
      # - light.living_room_lamp
    to: 'on'
conditions:
  - condition: time
    after: '21:00:00'
    before: '23:00:00'
action:
  - service: scene.create
    data:
      scene_id: office_wled_before_living_room_pulse
      snapshot_entities:
        - light.wled
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness_pct: 20
  - delay: '00:00:10'
  - service: scene.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: scene.office_wled_before_living_room_pulse

issues.recommendation: Verify entity scene.office_wled_before_living_room_pulse exists in Home Assistant. This entity was not validated during generation - consider using a validated entity instead.

warnings.recommendation: Verify entity scene.office_wled_before_living_room_pulse exists in Home Assistant. This entity was not validated during generation - consider using a validated entity instead.
